api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto Headlines News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back individual Crypto Headlines News from specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-headlines-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/coindesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-headlines-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-headlines-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{news_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-headlines-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto Headlines News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the Crypto Headlines News from various source.
